question: 大嫌い
sourceMnemonic:
Remember how <ja>嫌い</ja> is to <kanji>dislike</kanji>? When that dislike is <kanji>big</kanji>, you really dislike it. That means you <vocabulary>hate</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>really hate</vocabulary>) it.

As with <ja>嫌い</ja>, a more literal translation is <vocabulary>detestable</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the reading for <ja>大</ja>, and the reading for <ja>嫌い</ja> is like the one you learned with <ja>嫌い</ja> in level 20.
